game.name: What do you hear?? Yanny vs Laurel
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: What word or name do you hear, and how far do you have to move the slider to hear another? Check it out and be surprised by the possibilities of your brain!
game.shortDescriptionEn: What word or name do you hear, and how far do you have to move the slider to hear another? Check it out and be surprised by the possibilities of your brain!

reviewHighlights.text: ᅟ"[i]그래서 어느 쪽으로 들려?[/i]" ᅟ[b]"그만···."[/b] ᅟ"[i]이번엔? [b]《"예니"랑 "로렐" 어느 쪽으로 들려?》[/b][/i]" ᅟ[b]"그만, 그만하라고 했다···."[/b] ᅟ"[i]지금은? 예니랑 로렐 어떻게 드ㄹ·····.[/i]"...
